next_steps.note: "Brainstorm potential themes or subjects for the poetry (e.g., nature, love, loss, social commentary). Add 3-5 to the 'Ideas' list.",
"Research contemporary poets and poetry styles to identify potential inspiration. Document 2-3 poets/styles in 'Ideas'.",
"Draft a first poem â€“ aim for a short, free-verse piece, focusing on imagery. Add '[Draft 1 - Title]' to 'Progress' once completed.",
"Define a project scope. How many poems will this project encompass? Add this number to 'Ideas'.",
"Create a 'Revision Notes' section within the board to capture feedback and ideas for improvement on draft poems."
"Brainstorm 3 potential themes or subjects for the next set of poems, documenting ideas in the 'Ideas' list.",
"Draft a single poem (any length) focusing on one of the brainstormed themes, adding it to 'Progress' as a first draft.",
"Review the 'Ideas' list and prioritize the top 2 most compelling ideas for further development, noting reasons for prioritization.",
"Identify one potential resource (e.g., poet to read, writing prompt website, anthology) to inspire new work and add it to 'Ideas'.",
"Define the criteria for 'completion' of this poetry project (e.g., number of poems, specific style, submission goal) and document in 'Progress'."
